arts.ttl: Martin Keown reckons Liverpool star has had a “nightmare” against Palace so far
arts.sum: Liverpool are up against Crystal Palace in the Premier League, and they are 1-0 down after an early goal from Ismaila Sarr. The Premier League champions could have easily been down by two or three goals, had it not been for an exceptional performance from Alisson Becker.
